tool_description: Generates short-term volatility forecasts using GARCH models, machine learning, or time series analysis for proactive risk management.

model_type.description: Forecasting model: garch, arima, lstm, ensemble

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Need at least 50 volatility observations for reliable forecasting.
Forecast horizon out of range: Must be between 1 and 30 periods.
Invalid model type: Use one of [garch, arima, lstm, ensemble].
Invalid volatility values: All values must be non-negative numbers.
usage: Provide historical_volatility array and optionally set forecast_horizon and model_type. Returns volatility forecasts with confidence intervals.

forecasted_volatility.description: Point forecasts for each horizon period

model_accuracy.description: Model accuracy score based on backtesting
